text: Au e lliga i dogu hanadu gi goodou gi dee mmada adu gi goodou e hai gee godou mouli be dagu hai e hagamaanadu ai, gei goodou ga gidee bolo au e hagalee hai be di godou hagamaanadu. Au e lliga bolo au ga gidee goodou e lagamaaloo, manawa dubua, hagawelewele ngoohia, tumaanga, hagahuaidu, tamu dangada, hagapuu mo tee hagalongo.
